ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Premium_Pay_Status__c )) = "Cancelled" || TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Premium_Pay_Status__c )) = "Site Supervisor Approved" || TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Premium_Pay_Status__c )) = "TL Approved" || TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Premium_Pay_Status__c )) = "Denied") && Bypass_Automation__c = false
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The record is locked and no fields can be changed.
